price: Na kaumu ya Nuhu hapo mbele. Hakika hao walikuwa watu wapotovu.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
footnotes: Na kaumu ya Nuhu tuliihiliki kabla ya hawa. Hakika hao walikuwa watu walio toka nje ya ut'iifu wa Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
